title: Trump challenges order to rehire federal workers at Supreme Court
shortDescription: Trump's administration brought its bid to purge the federal workforce to the Supreme Court on Monday, challenging a judicial directive to rehire government employees.

title: President Trump shares post accusing judges of 'sedition and treason'
shortDescription: President Trump reposted an article on social media accusing judges of "sedition and treason" when they overturn executive actions.

title: Trump, lawyers clash over lawsuits - and 2016
shortDescription: Trump directed the Justice Department to probe law firms behind "frivolous" lawsuits. Critics said it was an attack on the rule of law.

title: GOP could raise student loan bills to pay for Trump's tax cuts
shortDescription: Millions of student loan borrowers could be stuck paying more as GOP lawmakers considering ending repayment plans to fund Trump's tax cuts.

title: South Korean court reinstates impeached PM Han Duck-soo as acting president
shortDescription: South Korea's top court reinstated Han Duck-soo as acting president as he pledged to focus on steering the nation through a U.S. "trade war".

title: GAO to review health and safety effects of Trump's mass firings
shortDescription: The Government Accountability Office's decision came at the request of Democratic lawmakers led by Sen. Elizabeth Warren.

title: Usha Vance, US officials to visit Greenland as Trump talks annexation
shortDescription: Second lady Usha Vance will visit Greenland on Thursday as President Donald Trump continues to express his desire for the U.S. to annex the territory.

title: Trump asks if Oswald was helped in assassinating JFK
shortDescription: Donald Trump said he believes the assassination of John F. Kennedy was carried out by Lee Harvey Oswald but asked if the gunman had help.

title: 'We need to deal with President Trump's tariffs': Canada prime minister calls election
shortDescription: Canada Prime Minister Mark Carney called for a snap election to let Canadians decide who should tackle the economy and Trump's tariffs.

title: Sanders gets up, tries to end interview after question about AOC joining Senate
shortDescription: Sen. Bernie Sanders stood up and tried to end an interview with ABC News when asked whether he wants Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez to join him in the U.S. Senate.

title: Trump 'should keep quiet': Christie warns against clash with Roberts
shortDescription: Former New Jersey Gov. Chris Christie warned President Donald Trump that calling for impeaching judges could hurt his chances at the Supreme Court.

title: Trump rides to Musk's rescue amid DOGE backlash
shortDescription: President Trump and Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick are pushing Tesla as the share price of Elon Musk's car company takes a DOGE-related beating.

title: Trump won't defy judge's order on Venezuelan deportations, border czar says
shortDescription: The Trump administration will not defy a judge's order blocking the use of war powers to deport alleged Venezuelan gang members, the border czar Tom Homan said on Sunday.

title: Changing the narrative: Trump 2.0 is reframing George Floyd and the 2020 protests
shortDescription: The president's supporters are looking for symbolic and substantive ways to change the narrative about the movement sparked by George Floyd's death

title: Rep. Brittany Pettersen balances motherhood while working in Congress
shortDescription: Rep. Brittany Pettersen (D-Colo.) talks about balancing motherhood while working in Congress as the deadline to avert a government shutdown approaches

title: Trump to end immigration status allowing Haitians, Venezuelans jobs
shortDescription: The Trump administration said migrants from Cuba, Haiti, Nicaragua and Venezuela were a burden but critics called revoking their legal status 'racist'

title: Trump pulls security clearances from Kamala Harris
shortDescription: President Trump pulled security clearances for Kamala Harris, Hillary Clinton and others.
